title: Custom Development
description: Payload CMS offers three feature types: Blank CMS for basic sites, Website CMS with collections and global elements, and eCommerce CMS for online stores. For customizations, we provide full-stack development services to tailor Payload CMS to your business needs and integrate it with relevant technologies.

title: Integration and <br class='hidden xxl:block' /> Deployment
description: Integrating and deploying Payload CMS involves incorporating it into your tech stack, connecting it with platforms like Next.js and Vercel for seamless functionality, and configuring it in your hosting environment for optimal performance. This ensures smooth operation, accessibility, and alignment with your business needs.

title: SEO-friendly
description: Payload CMS is SEO-friendly, offering built-in support for optimizing your content. It provides fields for adding titles, descriptions, and meta descriptions, allowing you to easily manage SEO settings for each page. This ensures your site is well-optimized for search engines, helping improve visibility and ranking.
